contentBlocks.heading: Research scope
paragraphs: Topic: Cost governance in agentic development. Angle: How teams manage model spend without reducing delivery speed.
Sources were selected from the last 14 days and validated through multi-round checks.

contentBlocks.heading: Verified findings
paragraphs: Signal 1: agentic. Repeated in 4 independent sources. Supporting sources: src-9, src-2, src-7, src-14.
Signal 2: governance. Repeated in 3 independent sources. Supporting sources: src-2, src-11, src-7.
Signal 3: model. Repeated in 2 independent sources. Supporting sources: src-9, src-6.
Signal 4: learn. Repeated in 2 independent sources. Supporting sources: src-9, src-11.
Signal 5: why. Repeated in 2 independent sources. Supporting sources: src-9, src-6.
